## Overview

This page showcases reusable code, analysis tools, and research utilities developed for JAB Lab projects.

All code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/JZStafura-Lab).

---

## Research Tools

### EMA & Text-Based Assessment
Tools for ecological momentary assessment and SMS-based data collection systems.

**Technologies:** Python, R, SMS APIs

**Status:** In development

---

### Statistical Analysis Utilities
Reusable functions for mixed models, psychometric analysis, and longitudinal data.

**Technologies:** R, Python (statsmodels, scikit-learn)

**Status:** In development

---

### Data Visualization
Custom plotting functions and dashboard templates for research reporting.

**Technologies:** R (ggplot2), Python (matplotlib, plotly)

**Status:** In development

---

## Example Datasets

Small, anonymized example datasets for methodological demonstrations available in the [repository](https://github.com/JZStafura-Lab/JZStafura-Lab.github.io/tree/main/data/examples).
